Package game.interfaces

Interface Chargeable

All Superinterfaces:
Weapon
All Known Implementing Classes:
StormRuler
public interface Chargeable
extends Weapon
A contract for chargeable instance (weapon). Classes that implement Chargeable must implement all the methods here.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void charge()
    Increase the charge count of the weapon.
    int getCharges()
    Getter of chargeCount.
    int getMaxCharges()
    Getter of chargeMax.
    void resetCharge()
    Reset the charge count of the weapon.

    Methods inherited from interface edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon

    chanceToHit, damage, getActiveSkill, verb
